message.body: Did you get through to your gate okay?

Yes. Just waiting to board. The man at the check-in station told me the Atlanta airport is the largest in the country; it's a good thing I have the extra layover time to try to navigate my way around!
I'm in Atlanta for a bit of a layover. The flight to Managua takes off at 5:50.
Safe travels! Enjoy and take lots of photos.
